lead_paragraph: This year’s draft, which is set to begin Thursday in Chicago, presents some difficult question marks for teams seeking to avoid troubled prospects.

headline.main: Draft Decisions Pivot Around Players’ Potential Character Flaws
headline.print_headline: Draft Decisions Pivot Around Players’ Potential Character Flaws
